name: Java DAB EPG API
short_description: An implementation of the ETSI DAB EPG standard (ETSI TS 102 818) incorporating an XML and binary marshaller (ETSI TR 102 371). This can be used by broadcasters for sending EPG data to a DAB multiplex for broadcast, or for general schedule interfacing.
